title: What we talk about when we talk about system design
dot: digraph DesignProcess{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];Research[label="Research Career\n(SOSP/OSDI Community)"];Industry[label="Industry Career\n(Production Settings)"];DesignProcess[label="Design Process: Fighting Complexity with Abstraction"];Rules[label="8 Rules for Design Process"];Rule1[label="1. Late-bind on designs"];Rule2[label="2. Each point solution is a DoS attack on the design process"];Rule3[label="3. Think in parallel; Design together; Implement in parallel; Review together"];Rule4[label="4. Talk about the problem, not existing systems"];Rule5[label="5. Always talk about a second application"];Rule6[label="6. For each abstraction, build one implementation; plan for a second; hope for a third"];Rule7[label="7. Abstraction is not free"];Rule8[label="8. Be critical (but about the right things)"];Research->DesignProcess[label="Experience"];Industry->DesignProcess[label="Experience"];DesignProcess->Rules[label="Guidelines"];Rules->Rule1;Rules->Rule2;Rules->Rule3;Rules->Rule4;Rules->Rule5;Rules->Rule6;Rules->Rule7;Rules->Rule8;Research[fillcolor="#E6F4F1", color="#007BFF"];Industry[fillcolor="#E6F4F1", color="#007BFF"];DesignProcess[fillcolor="#D1E8FF", color="#007BFF"];Rules[fillcolor="#D1E8FF", color="#007BFF"];Rule1[fillcolor="#F0F8FF", color="#6C757D"];Rule2[fillcolor="#F0F8FF", color="#6C757D"];Rule3[fillcolor="#F0F8FF", color="#6C757D"];Rule4[fillcolor="#F0F8FF", color="#6C757D"];Rule5[fillcolor="#F0F8FF", color="#6C757D"];Rule6[fillcolor="#F0F8FF", color="#6C757D"];Rule7[fillcolor="#F0F8FF", color="#6C757D"];Rule8[fillcolor="#F0F8FF", color="#6C757D"];}
